short_desc: 211 is the national, toll-free, three-digit phone number to call 24 hours a day for information about local health and human services
description: 2-1-1 is the national abbreviated dialing code for free access to health and human services information and referral (I & R). 2-1-1 is an easy-to-remember and universally recognizable number that makes a critical connection between individuals and families in need and the appropriate community-based organizations and government agencies.
